meanings.sent1: The alley had a garbagey smell from the overflowing bins.
meanings.sent2: The old, torn sofa looked so garbagey in the dim light.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon wore a garbagey hat made of discarded wrappers.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a garbagey mess, with clothes strewn everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The garbagey pond was covered in slimy green algae.

meanings.sent1: The garbagey bag split open, spilling trash all over the sidewalk.
meanings.sent2: The dumpster behind the restaurant was always overflowing and garbagey.
meanings.sent3: The garbagey sandwich had been left out for too long and attracted flies.
meanings.sent4: The garbagey water in the canal was polluted with plastic bottles.
meanings.sent5: The garbagey room was filled with discarded papers and broken toys.
